sentences.en: A seductive woman vamps the man by using her sensuality.
sentences.cn: 一位诱人的女子以她的性感色诱男人.

sentences.en: Aromatic mix of pure essential oils for sensual and seductive intimacy.
sentences.cn: 芳香混合纯精油的感官和诱人的亲密关系.

sentences.en: China is the most seductive growth story of our age.
sentences.cn: 中国有着我们这个时代最为诱人的增长故事.

sentences.en: He moved towards the seductive warmth of the fire.
sentences.cn: 他向诱人的温暖炉火移近.

sentences.en: Her arched eyebrows and grotesquely powdered face were at once seductive and grimly overbearing.
sentences.cn: 眉棱棱着,在一脸的怪粉上显出妖媚而霸道.

sentences.en: Her figure was slighter and therefore more seductive than Natalie.
sentences.cn: 她的身段比较苗条,因此比娜塔丽更加诱人.

sentences.en: I love dressing up to look seductive.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢打扮得性感一些。

sentences.en: Ishida love at first sight on the seductive fixed.
sentences.cn: 石田对妖媚的定一见钟情.

sentences.en: Nostalgia is, in the end, a seductive and sentimental fib.
sentences.cn: 怀旧最终不过是种诱人的、多情的谎言.

sentences.en: Recorded almost live, there's a certain seductive rawness about the whole thing.
sentences.cn: 整个作品几乎是实况录制，有一种引人入胜的真实感。

sentences.en: She used all of her seductive charm to try and persuade him.
sentences.cn: 她使出浑身魅力来说服他。

sentences.en: She used her most seductive voice.
sentences.cn: 她运用了自己最有魅力的嗓音。

sentences.en: The idea that shopping is the new politics is certainly seductive.
sentences.cn: 购物就是一种新型政治表达方式,这一理念当然深得人心.

sentences.en: They will be the most compelling and seductive element in the style.
sentences.cn: 它们是文风中最令人心悦诚服,最富有魅力的东西.

sentences.en: This offer of a high salary and a free house is very seductive.
sentences.cn: 这种高薪加免费住房的条件十分诱人.

sentences.en: You colour the idea of a prolonged existence in seductive hue.
sentences.cn: 你以引人入胜的色彩描绘了长寿的概念.

words.tran_cn: 勾引男人的女子；富有魅力的女子
有魅力的；性感的；引人注意的

trans.tran_cn: 诱惑的，引诱的，有魅力的，性感的，引人注意的
trans.tran_en: someone, especially a woman, who is seductive is sexually attractive
